basics.name: Nadia Lovko
basics.label: Graduate Student
basics.summary: I received a B.S. in Environmental Science with a concentration in Ecosystem Sciences from Indiana University in 2015, where I researched the effects of invasive grass species on soil C. I recently completed my M.S. in Biology from Bradley University, where I studied insect antipredation behavior.

work.company: The Grace Lab at Bradley University
work.summary: Studied the effects of dietary supplementation serotonin precursor on stalk-eyed fly aggression and antipredation behavior
highlights: Studied and quantified insect aggression and behavioral patterns
Prepared samples for analysis using RNA extraction and micro-dissection
Learned micro-dissection techniques, fly care, and RNA extraction with the Swallow Lab at the University of Colorado – Denver in Summer 2016
Analyzed insect brain serotonin levels using ELISAs
Maintained populations of stalk-eyed flies (primarily Teleopsis dalmanni), jumping spiders (Phiddipus audax and Phiddipus johnsoni), and fruit flies (Drosophila hydei)
Trained new lab members in laboratory skills and micro-dissection techniques

work.company: Bradley University Center for STEM Education
highlights: Worked with faculty and the public to encourage growth in STEM education
Organized and planned programs for STEM outreach
Organized and inventoried STEM center resources to be available to be checked out by educators
Recruited faculty and high school students for Summer STEM programs

work.company: The Phillips Lab at Indiana University
work.summary: Studied the effects of invasive Japanese stiltgrass on soil carbon pools and carbon cycling
highlights: Helped set up field sites and collected data/samples
Prepared samples for carbon and nitrogen analysis through vacuum filtration
Analyzed samples using fractionation techniques, loss on ignition, and elemental analysis
Gained experience with Proton Transfer Reaction – Mass Spectrometer
Managed student managers and delegated responsibilities
Assisted in training new employees
Prepared the concession stand and took inventory of supplies
Planned and prepared concession items for each event based on ticket sales
Balanced the cashboxes and inventory at the end of events
Greeted and seated patrons
Helped implement internal recycling program
Assisted accessibility-hindered patrons

work.summary: In charge of data metrics and reporting
